name: Kilmonger
detailed_description:
Length: 2 hours
Genre: visual novel, ADV, mysticism, horror, fantasy, ecchi

In one small but cruel world there were kilmongers - merchants of death. Those were the men who traded their souls in exchange for the powers to summon demons from the underworld. Kilmongers goal was to train them and to sell them to the Empire. But kilmonger Argus, the hero of the story, have different goal. He has score to settle with the dark side.
- This is non-linear visual novel - discover multiple endings depending on your choices in-game.
- Bonus secret side-character story.
- Great art, animated backgrounds, character-rich story with cunningly twisted plot.
- Villains, demons, violence and sex are here just to emphasize the main thing - it's a story about love and kindness. Lead the heroes through the darkness to true happy ending.

short_description: Who has never even dreamed of living a different life? Especially if yours is so gray and boring. Our hero, ordinarily an unappealing clerk, was lucky enough - he learned to leave his physical body and put his own astral projection in other people.
